title: Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 3 Pt.2
description: Our most inspiring game audio bundle EVER!
longDescription:
Audio Demo


The Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 3 includes over 6000 of our most premium audio assets for game, video, and/or motion graphics. Our newest collection provides 9+ hours of crisp sound in high-quality resolution, making it the go-to kit for ANY level of game developer or sound designer. Combining a total of 6 sound libraries, curated by award-winning sound designers, Sound Effects Kit 3 provides an immersive audio power pack library of SFX and loops for the complete game play experience.


  • 6148 game sound effects
  • 5.78 GB of samples
  • Over 9 hours of sound
  • 6 sound libraries included
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav format


Top of the line superior sound effects for your next game! Inside you will discover 9+ hours of our greatest sounds throughout the 6 featured libraries. All in crisp, high quality (44khz/16-bit.wav) resolution. These supreme sound effects come ‘Production Ready’ and include reliable sounds to bring your project to completion. Our sounds are battle-tested and user friendly. Providing you with our #1 selling SFX, the Sound Effects Kit 3 will take your gaming design to the next level.


What packs are included:


Library Name - Retail Price

  • Game Engines - $79
  • Game Footsteps - $39
  • Game Weapons - $96
  • Humanoid Creatures - $29
  • Metroivania Game - $49
  • Smart UI - $59

﻿

Don't forget to check out Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 3 Pt.1


Let this kit lead the way for your game audio needs. Discover the finest sound quality and variety to ensure Kit 3 becomes an EPIC staple within your sound studio. Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 3 engulfs listeners with handcrafted, professionally-designed, and specially curated SFX.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  5.78 GB of samples
  • Over 9 hours of sound
  • 6 sound libraries included
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav format

Number of Audio Waves: 6148

Number of Audio Cues: 6148

Sample rate / bit rate: 44k 16bit .wav

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 546

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
